thread.title: Ellen DeGeneres to Pulse survivor: 'You are inspiration'
thread.title_full: Ellen DeGeneres to Pulse survivor: 'You are inspiration'

author: Hal Boedeker
title: Ellen DeGeneres to Pulse survivor: 'You are inspiration'
text:
Ellen DeGeneres to Pulse survivor: 'You are inspiration' Caption ORMC ICU nurses recall Pulse tragedy 
On Feb. 24, 2017, a little more than eight months after the mass shooting at Pulse nightclub, Orlando Regional Medical Center ICU Trauma and Trauma Step Down nurses recall what it was like to take care of the victims of the massacre. 
(Paige Wilson/Orlando Sentinel) 
On Feb. 24, 2017, a little more than eight months after the mass shooting at Pulse nightclub, Orlando Regional Medical Center ICU Trauma and Trauma Step Down nurses recall what it was like to take care of the victims of the massacre. 
(Paige Wilson/Orlando Sentinel) Caption ORMC ICU nurses recall Pulse tragedy 
On Feb. 24, 2017, a little more than eight months after the mass shooting at Pulse nightclub, Orlando Regional Medical Center ICU Trauma and Trauma Step Down nurses recall what it was like to take care of the victims of the massacre. 
(Paige Wilson/Orlando Sentinel) 
On Feb. 24, 2017, a little more than eight months after the mass shooting at Pulse nightclub, Orlando Regional Medical Center ICU Trauma and Trauma Step Down nurses recall what it was like to take care of the victims of the massacre. 
(Paige Wilson/Orlando Sentinel) Caption Photos offer look inside Pulse in aftermath of mass shooting 
The city of Orlando released the first detailed photos inside the Pulse nightclub on Tuesday, taken by police after the June 12 mass shooting. 
The city of Orlando released the first detailed photos inside the Pulse nightclub on Tuesday, taken by police after the June 12 mass shooting. Caption Wife Of Pulse Gunman Due Back In Court 
Noor Salman says she had no idea that her husband, Omar Mateen, planned to attack the club 
Noor Salman says she had no idea that her husband, Omar Mateen, planned to attack the club Caption Pulse shooting ceremony honors victims on 6-month anniversary 
A ceremony was held Monday evening at the Orange County Regional History Center to honor Pulse shooting victims on the 6-month anniversary. 
A ceremony was held Monday evening at the Orange County Regional History Center to honor Pulse shooting victims on the 6-month anniversary. Caption Pulse donations to GLBT Center prompt review - Orlando News Now 
State officials have opened an investigation into funds raised by the GLBT Center of Orlando, “in an abundance of caution” after two complaints were filed by volunteers with the Department of Agriculture and Consumer Affairs.
